text: [Music]
hi everyone its Helen here today I will
make chicken salad but vegetarian so
it's an not chicken salad let's begin
[Music]
for this recipe I'm gonna use leek
instead of onion it tastes quite like
onion but a lot Marja I guess is what
brought to Vietnam by the French because
we also call it Poirot just slightingly
on the diagonal I'm using wheat tofu to
imitate chicken you can buy it frozen
like this at Asian grocery store it's
called me Kang in Vietnamese this pack
is 500 gram and it has 5 pieces in it
I'm just gonna use tree for the salad
today
Pat it right on a kitchen towel roots
you remove the excess moisture and pan
fry until golden brown on all sides
together with tofu making is very often
used in Vietnamese vegetarian cooking
just keep rotating until it turned
golden brown on all sides then remove
and place on a paper towel to remove the
excess oil set aside and wait for it to
cool down we're gonna hear the same area
to fry the leek stir well and keep it on
medium low until is turn quiet Gordon
immediately take off the heat you don't
want to wait until the color turned to
dark because could be very bitter any
kind of Vietnamese salads would need
herbs for the chicken salad we're gonna
use program or Vietnamese mint it has
rather long leaves and carries a peppery
spicy taste just roughly chop it up
another greens that we use to add in
this salad is lime leaves because
perfect with chicken and we want to add
it in this mob chicken salad to recall
that connection
when the fry wheat tofu has kundo we're
now gonna tear it all shredded into
pieces try to thread along the fiber
grain like the way you fried chicken
after pan frying the outer layer looks
real a chicken skin it has a golden
yellow color and is more chewy than the
inside white flesh look at this Hosea is
not shredded chicken he to make dressing
for our salad compile tablespoon of
sugar with a tablespoon of lime juice a
teaspoon of soy sauce 1/2 a teaspoon of
mushroom seasonings which is optional
and 1/2 a teaspoon of salt you don't
want to add too much soy sauce because
it could change the color of the chicken
stir well to dissolve now in a salad or
large mixing bowl add the shredded mock
chicken and toss well with half of the
dressings our dressing is well balanced
is sweet sour and savory the shredded
wheat tofu can absorb all this and
becomes really tasty after fragrant fry
leek some black pepper and mix really
well then add the Vietnamese mint and
lime leaf threads if you don't mind
eating onion you can sly onion thinly
and soak in cold water then add it into
the salad now pouring the rest of the
dressings and toss well sweet sour
savory we still lacking up some
spiciness so add some sliced hot chili
peppers and we are done you can serve it
like an appetizer with some rice cracker
or eat it with hot steamed rice is
really really good
I let my friend try this and told them
that it's made from a very precious and
expensive kind of chicken and after
tasting they all believed in and they
also even loved it so even if you're not
a vegetarian you can still give this
recipe a try when you're just getting
bored eating meat and chicken every day
so I hope you like it and thank you for
watching
